thread.title: Kendall Jenner’s Chanel Skirt Suit Is the Perfect Pick for Valentine’s Day
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner’s Chanel Skirt Suit Is the Perfect Pick for Valentine’s Day

title: Kendall Jenner’s Chanel Skirt Suit Is the Perfect Pick for Valentine’s Day
text: Kendall Jenner’s New Look Is Straight Out of Clueless February 15, 2017 12:09 AM by Maria Ward Photo: Splash News Considering Valentine’s Day always falls during Fashion Week , it’s only fitting that Kendall Jenner would combine the two in one chic swoop. When the model of the moment stepped out earlier today in New York, she wore the ultimate V-day look: a tweed skirtsuit from Chanel, complete with double-C logo button detail, that recalled the famously unlucky-in-love Cher Horowitz from Clueless . A crop top below the suit moved the outfit out of the office and into date-night territory, particularly with a belly chain layered underneath. A vintage gold Chanel necklace purchased from New York’s consignment store of choice, What Goes Around Comes Around, tied the look together. As for outerwear, Jenner’s plush mink could have easily been plucked from the closet of her sister Kylie, who has been seen at New York Fashion Week in a coterie of similar furry styles . The coat was a nice touch, but we think the suit alone was probably enough to steal someone’s (A$AP Rocky’s?) heart. In This Story: Kendall Jenner Recommended For You
